about_the_game:
The first ever biopunk pixel-art top-down shooter will help you plunge into the unique and gloomy world of Fleshinsane, in which you should masterfully combine melee and ranged weapons to effectively destroy hordes of enemies on the ancient ark. Each biome has a distinctive level design, unique enemies and bosses.

EACH RUN IS IT OWN UNIQUE STORY


Each run will start and end in different ways, the unpredictability of the game will allow you to play the game as if for the first time! Each level, as well as the location of the enemies, is procedurally generated - every time you get to an unknown level that is fraught with immeasurable dangers! You will have to quickly adapt to the new conditions here and now!

STRONG PROGRESSIONS


Each weapon has a unique firing mechanics. Rare weapons, each time they appear with arbitrary unique built-in modules, which in turn allow you to destroy opponents more effectively, ranging from destructive elements to incredible weapon properties.

WORLD FIRST BIOPUNK ROGULITE


Set in procedurally generated, life-like nightmarish dreamscapes, each environment brims with its own terrifying inhabitants and eerie atmospheres.
Fleshinsane combines a distinctive biopunk aesthetic with UI retro elements reminiscent of 80s games, crafting a truly unique and otherworldly experience. Immerse yourself into Fleshinsane!

content_descriptors.notes:
Profuse bleeding.
Devouring of the remains.
Nicotine addiction.

name: Fleshinsane Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB

short_description: Fight and destroy armed creatures in the name of inquisition and security on the ancient ark ship, use and combine melee and ranged attacks to destroy all life in a bewitching top-down shooter pixel art rogue-like!
